metadata.title: RZ/G3S: Tell me about the power supply modes of the RZ/G3S

sections.content:
Question:
Please tell me about the power supply modes of the RZ/G3S.
Answer:
The RZ/G3S each consist of three independent power domains. The power consumed by the SOC state can be significantly reduced by turning power domains off.
ALL_ON mode: All power domains are in the power-on state. 
AWO mode: The MPU domain is in the power-off state. Only the IP placed in the AWO domain can be operated. 
VBATT mode: The MPU domain and AWO domain are in the power-off state. Only the VBATT domain is powered on.
In addition, the RZ/G3S can maintain only the DDR I/O area in the power-on state.
Please also refer to the user's manual (https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/mah/rzg3s-group-users-manual-hardware?r=25458591), 41. Low Power Consumption.
